Patients receive paclitaxel IV 1 hour trastuzumab ( Herceptin ) IV 30-90 minute day 85 , 92 , 99 , 106 , 113 , 120 , 127 , 134 , 141 , 148 , 155 , 162 . Approximately 1-2 week completion neoadjuvant chemotherapy , patient undergo breast conservation surgery , modify radical mastectomy , mastectomy .
